ComicInfo.Series: The Other History of the DC Universe
ComicInfo.Summary: 1992-2007: Renee Montoya: The life story of Renee Montoya including her growing up and joining the GCPD, hiding her sexual orientation and the impact it had on her life and relationships when Two-Face exposed her as a lesbian, and meeting with Vic Sage and succeeding him as The Question.
